title: SYEAHSKATE 4 : ARROSTIA (SICKNESS) - Main Feature (DivX)
description:
SYEAHSKATE 4 : ARROSTIA (SICKNESS) (33:00) 
GREEK ROLLERBLADING 2008
WITH ENGLISH SUBTITLES!!! 
DivX file (500MB)

-Arrostia (Sickness) is the latest video attempt from Syeahskate , the oldest inline skating crew of Greece. Prepare yourselves for our "ill" themed DVD with skating from almost every afflicted person in Syeahskate in various cities of Greece and abroad.
This took us almost two years of touring, filming, editing, producing and general foolishness so we think its definitely worth your downloading time! bear in mind this isn&#039;t a pro video, dont expect any mind-boggling tricks here, we are all amateurs but this totally represents our scene and we bet our video is more fun and interesting than the majority of action sports videos out there. hope you enjoy this,check out all the links above for everything concerning syeahskate!THANKS IN ADVANCE FOR DOWNLOADING AND VIEWING, we would love to hear your comments!

Thanks for downloading and viewing !!!

-In order to view the video file on a computer you will need the DivX codec installed in your computer. You most probably already have it installed, but if not please visit www.divx.com and download/install the DivX Codec!!
-In order to watch this video on a DVD player, just burn this file on a DVD-R as data and make sure your DVD player plays DivX files (most of them do, nowadays!)
